title: Create Multiple Layers with Feature Type Fanouts

questions.question: Which of these scenarios would benefit from using a fanout?
options: You want to create a separate CSV file for each layer in your source dataset.
You want the workspace to work with a dynamic schema, outputting whatever data it is given.
You want to let the user choose the format for their output.
You want to store a local version of all ports in your workspace for faster development.

questions.question: If you want to create multiple layers or tables in your output dataset, which type of fanout should you use?
You set a feature type fanout by adding a Fanout object to the Canvas.
